headline: The Langs' troubling friendship with Jeffrey Epstein
description: Former French culture minister Jack Lang and his daughter Caroline Lang appear thousands of times in the most recently released documents. All evidence suggests that she had a much closer relationship with the sex offender than she now admits.

headline: Iran's regime sentences protesters to death
'Trump is the president of instability and uncertainty, increasingly to his own detriment'
Several extremist French groups come under government scrutiny
description: After the fatal beating of a far-right activist, the Interior Ministry is considering banning several groups and has reported the possible 'reconstitution' of a banned far-left group, Jeune Garde, to the courts.

headline: 2030 Winter Olympics top organizer steps down
description: Cyrille Linette's departure had been expected for several days due to an ongoing feud with Edgar Grospiron, another top organizer of the upcoming Winter Games in France.

headline: Five Paris restaurants serving mouthwatering ramen
description: A staple of Japanese cuisine, this noodle soup takes on subtle flavors depending on whether it is made with pork, fish or vegetables. Here are our picks for the best places to enjoy excellent ramen in the French capital.

headline: After four years of war in Ukraine, Russia's economy could fall into recession
description: The Russian economy, fueled by the country's military-industrial complex, had long posted growth rates above the European average. Today, however, the country's economic indicators are all in the red.

description: With his racist post about the Obamas, support for immigration police and decision to politicize Puerto Rican singer Bad Bunny's halftime Super Bowl show, the US president has alienated some of his supporters.

headline: 'The unnatural alliance between Trump and White evangelicals has cost them dearly, even if it allowed them to gain positions of power'
description: Historian Sébastien Fath discusses the history and dynamics of evangelical Protestant churches in an interview with Le Monde. Despite their current vibrancy, their growth is not inevitable, the researcher argues.

headline: Dark Bank: American suspected of leading an international criminal organization extradited to France
description: Huzefa Hafiz Ismail arrived on French soil on Friday. He was arrested in August 2024 in Texas at the request of French judicial authorities, who suspect him of leading a vast money laundering network.
